info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: creates various statistics on BAM files using RSeQC and samtools, which can be used for quality assessment
info.paperDescription: Quality assessment of the resulting mappings was ensured using RSeQC [Liguo Wang, Shengqin Wang, Wei Li; RSeQC: quality control of RNA-seq experiments, Bioinformatics, Volume 28, Issue 16, 15 August 2012, Pages 2184â€“2185].

param.name: bam
param.description: path to one or more BAM file(s)

param.name: outdir
param.description: path to the output folder; individual files will be stored in a sub-folder (using the basename of the BAM file as folder name)

param.name: readLength
param.description: maximal length of the reads

param.name: sampleDepth
param.description: number of reads which are used for sampling

param.name: annotation
param.description: gene annotation in BED format

param.name: geneBodyAnnotation
param.description: genes that are used to calculate the gene body coverage; should contain house keeping genes

param.name: idxstats
param.description: enables calculation of number of reads mapped on each chromosome

param.name: flagstat
param.description: enables calculation of flags of mapped reads

param.name: count
param.description: enables calculation of raw and rpkm count table for exons, introns and mRNAs

param.name: saturation
param.description: enables down-sampling of the mapped reads to infer the sequencing depth

param.name: statistics
param.description: calculates reads mapping statistics

param.name: clipping
param.description: enables clipping statistic of the mapped reads

param.name: insertion
param.description: enables insertion statistic of the mapped reads

param.name: deletion
param.description: enables deletion statistic of the mapped reads

param.name: inferExperiment
param.description: tries to infer if the sequencing was strand specific or not

param.name: junctionAnnotation
param.description: enables checking of how many of the splice junctions are novel or annotated

param.name: junctionSaturation
param.description: enables down-sampling of the spliced reads to infer if sequencing depth is enough for splicing analyses

param.name: distribution
param.description: calculates how mapped reads are distributed among different genomic features

param.name: duplication
param.description: calculates sequence duplication levels

param.name: gc
param.description: calculates GC-content of the mapped reads

param.name: nvc
param.description: checks if a nucleotide composition bias exist

param.name: insertSize
param.description: calculates the insert size between two paired RNA reads

param.name: fragmentSize
param.description: calculates the fragment size for each transcript

param.name: tin
param.description: calculates the transcript integrity number which is similar to the RNA integrity number

param.name: paired
param.description: must be set if paired-end data is analyzed

param.name: stranded
param.description: must be set if strand-specific data is analyzed

param.name: disableAllDefault
param.description: disables all options which are not explicitly activated
